description: Verify the E2E pipeline test implementation

patterns.test_pattern: pytest tests with markers (e2e marker defined in pyproject.toml)
patterns.fixture_pattern: conftest.py provides synthetic_video fixture using OpenCV
patterns.step_pattern: Each step has config, contracts (input/output models), and step class with execute() method
patterns.mocking_pattern: GPU steps (S03, S04) are mocked by creating fake output files and contract objects

existing_implementations.description: E2E test already implemented with synthetic video generation and step mocking

test_structure.connectivity_verification: Verifies each step's output connects to next step's input

verification_requirements.marker_test: pytest -m e2e should run only E2E tests
verification_requirements.existing_tests: No existing tests to maintain (only E2E test exists)
